name: sgn-explorer
description: Explorer web UI for the Celer State Guardian Network (SGN)

scripts.build:ropsten: rm -rf build-ropsten && REACT_APP_NETWORK_ID=3 react-scripts build && mv build build-ropsten
scripts.build:mainnet: rm -rf build-mainnet && REACT_APP_NETWORK_ID=1 react-scripts build && mv build build-mainnet
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run cleanup-gh-pages && gh-pages -b deploy-ropsten -d build-ropsten --message "[skip ci] Update ropsten deployment"
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run cleanup-gh-pages && gh-pages -b deploy-mainnet -d build-mainnet --message "[skip ci] Update mainnet deployment"
